ygData.subject: Re: Smithing Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t really know West Karana too well other than how to run through it quickly (I m a bard), which village is the McMannus village? Jyzan
ygData.messageBody:
> >
> >2) Where can banded molds be purchased for each size? I know you can
> >buy medium in Freeport, small in Kelethin and large somewhere like Grobb
> >or Oggok, but there surely must be more. Any help is appreciated,
> >particularly for large molds in a place non-evil characters can visit
> >and small molds on the continent of Antonica.
>
> I have never seen small molds on Antonica. It'd be near Rivervale if
> anywhere. You can get large molds from the McMannus Village in the west
> plains of Karana, and medium from the Sayers in the cottage on the road
> between Qeynos and Surefall Glade.

I don't really know West Karana too well other than how to run through it
quickly (I'm a bard), which village is the McMannus village?

Jyzan
